Description.Name: Pox Outbreak
Description.Details:
Darius knocks on your cabin's door in the middle of the night, his face pallid. "It has started, Commander. Several crew members have been hospitalized in the last few hours, all with symptoms of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDeathsMask],Death's Mask]]. 

[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] has already been placed on life support, and both [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]]'s vitals are also quickly degrading. Their faces are turning twisted like the other casualties from the holovids coming from the entire Periphery. The MedTechs say that at this point the epidemic might be contained, but we can't be sure if everyone has been already infected."

Description.Name: Let the Death's Mask epidemic run its course.
High death toll among the crew
Description.Details:
Late the next afternoon, Darius arrives at your quarters with the butcher's bill. "[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is dead from the plague, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] are under intensive care, and all ship departments report additional losses.

"And I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Taurians have declared a pandemic and have imposed travel bans on all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can prove that our company is plague free, no regular JumpShip will allow us to travel into Taurian territory for the next three months."

Description.Name: Call for help from nearby DropShips.
High death toll among the crew
Description.Details:
Late in the evening, Sumire notifies you that some of the nearby starships replied to the distress calls but none sent any actual help other than quarantine recommendations. 

On the next day, Darius comes to you with the butcher's bill. "[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has died, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] have survived the Death's Mask, and all ship departments report additional losses, although we managed to implement a few containment measures.

"And I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Taurians have declared a pandemic and have imposed travel bans on all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can prove that our company is plague free, no regular JumpShip will allow us to travel into Taurian territory for the next three months."

Description.Name: High death toll among the crew
Description.Details:
Late in the evening, Sumire notifies you that some of the nearby starships replied to the distress calls and even sent medical supplies to help. 

On the next day, Darius comes to you with the butcher's bill. "[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] didn't survive, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] are both in a coma from Death's Mask symptoms, and all ship departments report additional losses, although we managed to implement a few containment measures.

"And I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Taurians have declared a pandemic and have imposed travel bans on all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can prove that our company is plague free, no regular JumpShip will allow us to travel into Taurian territory for the next three months."

Description.Name: Airlock everyone with symptoms
Description.Details:
"Dr. Murad, you are to confine everyone who is displaying symptoms in one of the MechBays, next to the drop doors". Yang looks concerned but Farah nods. "The MedBay is already full and we have more confirmed cases. This way we'll keep them all together and hopefully contain the outbreak."

You turn then to Darius. "Once that's done, secure the DropShip's MechBays and vent them into space. Since they're carriers we need to take radical action to prevent this biological weapon from wiping out this company".

Dr. Murad is aghast at your order. "Commander, these people might have a chance to survive the pox with proper treatment. We can't simply write them off-".

"We can. The Commander is right. If we eliminate anyone with the virus, there's no way it can infect anyone else on the ship". No one else dares to reply to Yang.

Description.Name: Level four decontamination
Description.Details:
After Sumire closes the drop doors, everyone is silent in the DropShip's bridge for several moments as the bodies of [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] float into the darkness of space until they disappear from visual range.

"Brothers and sisters, into the void we return you, to again become cosmic dust and remain for the rest of your days in peace".

Darius finds you later. "I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Taurians have declared a pandemic and have imposed travel bans on all incoming Periphery traffic. No regular JumpShip will allow us to travel into Taurian territory for the next three months."

Description.Name: Instruct MedTechs to try your Pox antivirals against the Death's Mask virus.
Moderate losses among the crew
Description.Details:
You turn to Dr. Murad. "We've gotten those expensive antivirals to use on our people. Make sure the MedTechs spare no effort on the medical treatments.

Hours later, she comes back with the final report on casualties. "It helped, but we still lost some people to the Death's Mask even after using our entire stock of antivirals. This confirms that the pox plague has mutated into a more deadlier form, making the existing medicine insufficient to treat it until a new antiviral is developed."

Darius joins you. "I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Taurians have declared a pandemic and have imposed travel bans on all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can prove that our company is plague free, no regular JumpShip will allow us to travel into Taurian territory for the next three months."

Description.Name: Moderate death toll among the crew
Description.Details: "That's bullshit," you snap at Darius. "We spent a lot of money on that Hospital Bay precisely to deal with this sort of medical emergency." "Commander…" begins Darius, before stopping himself. He follows you as you stalk over to the Hospital Bay, where you yell at the MedTechs, and generally clarify that letting the infected die is not an option. The stressed MedTechs scurry around trying every risky solution they can think of to save the infected. A few hours after you arrive, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] improve. Just as exhausted as the MedBay staff, you still find strength for another depresing report from Darius. "I have more bad news, Commander. The pox has spread so much that everyone has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to any Inner Sphere system for the next three months."
